name: @brick-dev63/brick-style-dictionary
description: This example code is bare-bones to show you what this framework can do. If you have the style-dictionary module installed globally, you can `cd` into this directory and run: ```bash style-dictionary build ```

scripts.copy: npm run copyCss && npm run copyScss && npm run copyJson
scripts.copyBuild: npm run rollup && npm run copy
scripts.rollup: npm run clean && npm run build && rollup -c
scripts.watch: npm run build && chokidar  "tokens/**/*.json" -c "npm run build"
